title: Trump Tries To Flip The Gameboard, Rush Limbaugh is Confused 7.31.20
itunes:title: Trump Tries To Flip The Gameboard, Rush Limbaugh is Confused 7.31.20
description:
In episode 684, Jack and Miles are joined by comedian Greg Edwards to discuss Rep. Gohmert claiming he will take hydroxychloroquine to treat his Covid, Herman Cain passing from coronavirus, Trump floating the idea of delaying the 2020 election, how public opinion has changed on Black Lives Matter, Rush Limbaugh not being able to believe that people support Black Lives Matter, what we're re-watching, and more!

FOOTNOTES;

  1. Gohmert Says He Will Take Hydroxychloroquine For COVID-19, Flouting FDA Warning
  2. HERMAN CAIN DEAD AT 74 FROM COVID ... Attended Trump Tulsa Rally
  3. Trump floats idea of election delay, a virtual impossibility
  4. How Public Opinion Has Moved on Black Lives Matter
  5. Majority agree with Black Lives Matter and say major police reform is needed — CBS News poll
  6. Most view kneeling during anthem as acceptable form of protest - CBS News poll
  7. Rush Limbaugh Hates White Women So Much Right Now, He Just Called Them Black Men
  8. 8 Of The Top 20 TV Shows Right Now Are Netflix Originals
  9. The 10 Most Popular Movies On Netflix (So Far) In 2020
  10. WATCH: Wilma Archer - Like A Hunger ft. Amber Mark

Learn more about your ad-choices at https://www.iheartpodcastnetwork.com

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
